content.text: Match ends, Leicester City 2, West Bromwich Albion 2.
Second Half ends, Leicester City 2, West Bromwich Albion 2.
Substitution, West Bromwich Albion. Sandro replaces Stéphane Sessegnon.
Substitution, West Bromwich Albion. Victor Anichebe replaces Salomón Rondón.
Attempt missed. Riyad Mahrez (Leicester City) left footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is too high. Assisted by Jamie Vardy with a cross following a corner.
